Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Voodoo Doll -- Can cast FireBall and IceBall
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Woohoo = Tool:WaitForChild("Woohoo")
VoodooScript = script:WaitForChild("VoodooScript")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = 25
BillboardGui = Instance.new("BillboardGui") BillboardGui.Name = "Announcement" BillboardGui.Active = false BillboardGui.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) BillboardGui.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) BillboardGui.AlwaysOnTop = true TextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") TextLabel.Text = "" TextLabel.TextColor = BrickColor.new(Color3.new(1, 0, 0)) TextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) TextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1 TextLabel.FontSize = 4 TextLabel.Parent = BillboardGui
Ball = Instance.new("Part") Ball.Name = "HC" Ball.Material = Enum.Material.Granite Ball.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball Ball.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ball.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ball.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Ball.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Ball.Transparency = 0.25 Ball.CanCollide = false
BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Ball:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Name = "BodyForce"
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit, BallClone) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then if not Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild(VoodooScript.Name) then local VoodooScriptClone = VoodooScript:Clone() VoodooScriptClone.Disabled = false local creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = Player creator.Parent = VoodooScriptClone local Tag = BallClone:FindFirstChild("Debuff") Tag.Parent = VoodooScriptClone VoodooScriptClone.Parent = Hit.Parent end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end if BallClone and BallClone.Parent then BallClone:Destroy() end end
function Shoot(Position) local SpawnPosition = Torso.Position SpawnPosition = SpawnPosition + Position.unit * 5
local BallClone = Ball:Clone() BallClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(SpawnPosition, (SpawnPosition + Position)) Debris:AddItem(BallClone, 5) BallClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") BallClone.Velocity = (Position * 75)
local BallFloat = BodyForce:Clone() BallFloat.Parent = BallClone
local Random = math.random(1, 2)
BallClone.BrickColor = BrickColor.new((Random == 1 and "Bright red") or "Pastel Blue")
local Tag = Instance.new("StringValue") Tag.Name = "Debuff" Tag.Value = ((Random == 1 and "Fire") or "Ice") Tag.Parent = BallClone local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = ((Random == 2 and Color3.new(0, 0, 10.75)) or Fire.Color) Fire.Parent = BallClone
BallClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) Blow(Hit, BallClone) end)
end
function Activated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
BillboardGui.Adornee = Head
Woohoo:Play()
local Random = math.random(1, 2)
if Random == 1 then TextLabel.Text = "EXTRA HEALTH!!" local Ratio = (Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 160 Humanoid.Health = (Ratio * 160) else TextLabel.Text = "HASTE!!" Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 22 end
wait(1)
TextLabel.Text = ""
wait(5)
local Ratio = (Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth) Humanoid.Health = (Ratio * 100) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 100 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Head or not Torso then return end BillboardGui.Parent = Player.PlayerGui
HumanoidDamagedConnection = Humanoid.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("ObjectValue") and Child.Name == "creator" then local Enemy = Child.Value if Enemy and Enemy.Parent and Enemy ~= Player then local EnemyCharacter = Enemy.Character local EnemyTorso = EnemyCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if EnemyTorso then TextLabel.Text = "YOUR ENEMY IS MY ENEMY" local Direction = (EnemyTorso.Position - Head.Position).unit Shoot(Direction) end end end end)
end
function Unequipped() if BillboardGui and BillboardGui.Parent then BillboardGui.Parent = nil end if HumanoidDamagedConnection then HumanoidDamagedConnection:disconnect() end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then local Ratio = (Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth) Humanoid.Health = (Ratio * 100) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 100 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Woohoo:Stop() end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Tag = script:FindFirstChild("Debuff") Creator = script:FindFirstChild("creator")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Duration = 5
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
if Torso then if Tag.Value == "Fire" then local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Parent = Torso local StartTick = tick() while (tick() - StartTick) < Duration do UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Creator.Value) Humanoid:TakeDamage(5) wait(1) end if Fire and Fire.Parent then Fire:Destroy() end else local Ice = Instance.new("Fire") Ice.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0.75) Ice.Parent = Torso local StartTick = tick() while (tick() - StartTick) < Duration do Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 8 UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Creator.Value) Humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(1) end if Ice and Ice.Parent then Ice:Destroy() end end end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
wait(1)
script:Destroy()
